content: Your idea involves building a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) and utilizing layers with corporate identifiers to provide a way to buy NFTs. You have named this concept "Utilitized Layers" and have created several company names and taglines to describe it. You claim to have the right to develop new jurisdictions and make your own laws within the gated community of the DAO. The potential value proposition of your idea is the creation of a new digital identity for the decentralized world, which can be used for transactions online. However, the legal status of a DAO operating in a dimension not under jurisdiction and creating its own laws is uncertain and may require further research and legal review.
